channel.title: David Kjerrumgaard on Community Over Code Europe
channel.description: Recent content in David Kjerrumgaard on Community Over Code Europe

item.title: Oxia - A Horizontally Scalable Alternative to Apache Zookeeper
item.description: For over a decade, Apache Zookeeper has played a crucial role in maintaining configuration information and providing synchronization within distributed systems. Its unique ability to provide these features made it the de facto standard for distributed systems within the Apache community. Despite its prolific adoption, there is an emerging trend toward eliminating the dependency on Zookeeper altogether and replacing it with an alternative technology. The most notable example is the KRaft subproject within the Apache Kafka community,
